scene_description_enriched: A bishop, identified by his mitre and crozier, is depicted seated on a throne. He wears a blue cope over a white alb and a pink undergarment. The cope is adorned with a central orphrey of gold stripes. His right hand is raised in a gesture of blessing, with two fingers extended. The background features a red curtain with gold ornamentation on the right and a patterned tapestry of alternating gold and blue squares, each containing a white crown or snowflake-like motif, on the left. The bishop is seated on a red cushion or carpet with gold floral patterns. The scene is framed by decorative borders.
